name: Snakes in Space (itch)
description:
Snakes are not only creatures of earth but are also aliens and they are starting to invade. Become a solider and learn how to defend the human races from the Snake aliens known as "Snecks". Once you have learned how to use your weapons take the fight to them and defeat the Sneck Boss.

This game Will still be getting updates and more levels added. If you enjoyed the first three levels please lets us know.
